column1: Uryupinsk (Russian: Урю́пинск) is a town in Volgograd Oblast
column3: located 340 kilometers (210 mi) northwest of Volgograd on the Khopyor River. Population: 41

column1: There are two theories of the historical background for the town's name. One is that it is from name of a Tartar prince Uryup
column2: who got bogged down in a swamp near this location
column3: during a fight with Yermak and got captured. Another is that it is from either the family name Uryupin or the word "урюпа" (uryupa). According to the 1866 Explanatory Dictionary of the Living Great Russian Language by Vladimir Dal
column4: this archaic word means untidy person
column5: which probably in this context characterizes not a person

column1: The name of this town is known to many Russian people as a synonym for "backwater town". This usage became widespread after the popular Soviet film Destiny of a Man. The film was based on a short story by Mikhail Sholokhov
column2: and Uryupinsk was the place of the action
column3: shown as an inconspicuous provincial town.

column1: Founded in the late 14th–early 15th century as Uryupin
column2: it was a border outpost of the Principality of Ryazan
column4: it is the stanitsa of Uryupinskaya and home of Pokrovskaya Fair
column5: a center for trade on the southeastern side of the East European Plain. It was renamed Uryupinsk and granted town status in 1929.

column1: Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Uryupinsk serves as the administrative center of Uryupinsky District
column3: even though it is not a part of it. As an administrative division
column4: it is incorporated separately as the town of oblast significance of Uryupinsk—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column5: the town of oblast significance of Uryupinsk is incorporated as Uryupinsk Urban Okrug.

column1: Uryupinsk is a developed industrial center with a concentration in heavy industries such as agricultural machinery (harvesting machines) and loading equipment (a large crane-making plant is located here). The city also contains factories of light industry production (such as knitted fabric
Another major industry involving the outlying areas of the town is goat farming and goat leather production. Because of its mild southern climate
column2: the region is a good area for agriculture
column3: and there are many agricultural processing factories in the region
